topics.body:
I just thought of something interesting about mythology:

Personally I like mythology a lot and it's a massive fundamental part of society since religions did initially cause the development of society. . . Hold on I don't mean that as a generic, "God is good blah blah blah" way. I mean that as a thanks to religion the code of hammurabi was created and that religion has played a big role in society.  While I am against theocracy, I do recognize the importance it plays in society.

Going back to what I realized; out of all the religions past and present in the world I realized something.  While a lot of religions depict their god/s/esses as caring divine individuals there's one religion that one of their gods sticks out above the rest.  Prometheus.


Now don't get me wrong people are allowed to believe whatever they want, but Prometheus was pecked by a bird of his own mythos for giving fire to man.

Prometheus defied his fellow gods and went, "fuck that" and actually committed this to help others.  That is why in my book religion wise Prometheus to me mythology wise is the most benevolent.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52e32ec46368723d1c850000#post_52e32ec46368723d1c850000
The fear of god(s) may had a major role in this, while not worshiping Zeus could imply consequence according to the priests because of his power, Prometheus could have been saw as a god who didn't mind that much not receiving many tributes.

Also as others divinities hated Prometheus, seeking his blessing may had been seen as dangerous for causing their wrath and an act of defiance against the pantheon.

So I found a yuri show called sakura trick. . I thought it was going to be bad, but it's surprisingly okay.  It has a actual lesbian couple as the main characters.  I mean a actual couple; not that generic, "teehee we're a couple" stuff you find most of the time.

It may just be about a couple in highschool, but I would suggest watching it.

topics.body:
It is incredibly boring to have to wait until 2am to actually _do_ anything online once bandwidth limits are exceeded every month. Curiously, Derpibooru still works and works very well even though I am unable to load literally any other website. So where shall I spend the next few days until the first of the month? I'm kind of okay with this.

Ironically enough however, I'm usually up until 4 or 5 in the morning anyway, so it's more of a minor thing. I guess I'll hang out here for a bit because I'd forgotten db even _HAD_ a forum until like... Saturday

topics.body:
I have enough materials for several art projects and yet anytime I think about doing them I'm just "Nah, let's do something else less stressful."

[spoiler]Also, I'm not really a Homestuck anymore (thanks to awful people IRL) so now I have tons of black and gray fleece and no motivation to sew it into anything;;; :C[/spoiler]

Maybe if I make something I'll feel ambitious again. I hand-stitched one of "these bat thingies":http://uploads.neatorama.com/images/posts/779/52/52779/1348446469-0.jpg back in September and I was really excited to keep going but ever since I haven't moved on to other projects. I was going to make a plush Shibe from Pom Gets Wi-Fi (I had my pattern ready to) but PGW got unpopular really fast and I lost motivation for him.
!http://a.deviantart.net/avatars/l/a/lazycryplz.png?2!
I should just pick a project and be happy with it anyways.
